root.name: AquaNox
root.description: PC System RequirementsMinimumWindows 95/98/Me/2000500MHz Athlon or Pentium 3 processor128MB RAMDirect3D 8 compatible graphics card with 16MB memory4X CD-ROM drive800MB free hard disk spaceDirectX 8 compatible sound cardRecommended800Mhz Athlon or Pentium 3 processor256MB RAMDirect3D 8 compatible graphics card with 32MB memory1GB free hard disk spaceSoundblaster live or compatible soundcardSupported graphics chips: nVidia Ge Force 256, nVidia GeForce2, nVidia GeForce3, 3DFX Voodoo 5500, ATI Radeon, Hercules Kyro II
